At an amusement park by the sea, you met Barney, a local

And yet, when you asked him what his favorite animal was,

Now why was that?

Indeed, hardly anyone there could speak any English at all.

The next day you went on a train ride. In your compartment

name: yuya
bio:
🏆【Italki公式 & YouTuber公認】 
数多くのItalki公式動画や有名インフルエンサーの動画に「模範講師」として選ばれています。
メディアも認める質の高いレッスンを提供します。

【N1・N2合格後、会話に悩んでいませんか？】 
私は台北に12年（北京2年）住んでおり、中華圏学習者の「悩み（発音や不自然な表現）」を熟知しています。
単なる会話練習ではなく、日本での就職・留学・昇進を叶えるための「実戦トレーニング」を行います。

【私の強み】 
［キャリア支援］日本企業への就職、大学留学のための面接対策やES添削が得意です。 
［確かなビジネス教養］『もしドラ』著者（岩崎夏海氏）の講座等に15年間参加し、ドラッカー経営学を学び続けています。経営者や管理職の方とも高度な議論が可能です。 
［幅広い知識］経済・歴史・文化など、知的な話題で会話の幅を広げます。

🏆【Italki 官方与知名网红认证】 
我经常作为“模范讲师”受邀出演 Italki 官方及知名网红的视频。媒体信赖的顶尖品质。

・楽しく日本語を話したい方

After each lesson, I provide a summary of the words and expressions we covered and gi
headline: Claire helps you speak Korean step by step—with comfort and confidence

name: Cesar
bio: Hi, I’m Cesar, a teacher in New York City with a passion for languages and real-world communication. Born and raised in NYC, I bring a multicultural perspective to teaching, speaking Spanish (native), Portuguese (fluent), and some Chinese/Japanese. Whether you want to chat about travel, food, or daily life, I’ll help you speak English naturally—with confidence and a smile. Let’s make learning feel like a lively conversation!
headline: Clear, supportive English lessons for All.

name: Bilyana
bio: Hi, my name is Bilyana! My two big passions are languages and teaching. I am a native French speaker. I moved to France when I was 10, and I grew up there with the French language and culture. I love studying new languages, which is why I enjoy meeting people from all around the world and sharing my language with them. I am currently pursuing a university degree to become a professional French teacher. I also hold a DELF certificate.

name: Caoimhín
bio:
Hello! I'm Caoimhín and I teach Irish here on italki.

Some facts about me:

I'm originally from Dublin, where English is the main language, but I did all my schooling through Irish, so I've been hearing, speaking, reading, and writing Irish since I was four years old.

I started teaching Irish about four or five years ago and I really enjoy it. Even as a teacher, there's always more to learn. I love discovering new words and phrases and sharing them with my students.

I'm a microbiologist by tr
headline: Language mentor, language learner – let's learn together!

name: Helia
bio:
Hi! I’m Lia. I’m 22 years old, originally from Iran, and now living in Italy where I study Genomics at the University of Bologna.
I speak three languages: Persian (native), English (near-native), and Italian (still learning). I’ve been teaching English for about three years, and now I also teach Persian.

(My calender may not be updated occasionally, so feel free to send me a message to plan your lesson if you couldn't find a suitable time-slot!)
headline: Passionate Persian And English Tutor With 3 Years of Experience

name: MUTSUMI
bio:
こんにちは、むつみです✈️
初級で止まってしまった大人学習者向けに、日本語会話を教えています。
16歳でオーストラリア留学後、日本・台湾の航空会社でキャビンアテンダントとして勤務。
丁寧で自然な日本語、相手に配慮したコミュニケーションが強みです。
英語・中国語サポートOK。初心者でも安心して話せる、落ち着いたレッスンを行っています。
旅行会話・日常会話・日本の文化やマナーなど、実生活で使える日本語を中心に学びます。

Hello, I’m Mutsumi ✈️
I specialize in adult beginners who feel stuck with Japanese.
I studied abroad in Australia and worked as a flight attendant for Japanese and Taiwanese airlines.My lessons focus on polite, natural Japanese for real life.
English and Chinese support available. Calm, b
headline: Adult Beginners｜Polite, Natural Japanese Conversation

name: Lina Velasco
bio: ¡Hola! Soy Lina, tu guía para dominar el español con confianza desde la vibrante Isla de Margarita, Venezuela. Especialista en conversación práctica y cultura hispana, mis clases son tu puente para hablar con naturalidad, ya sea sobre la riqueza venezolana, la "Perla del Caribe" o temas cotidianos. ¡Aprenderás divirtiéndote! Cuando no enseño, me inspiro caminando entre playas, cocinando arepas o descubriendo nuevas historias. ¿Listo para tu próxima aventura en español? ¡Agenda tu clase hoy!
headline: Habla con confianza. Clases de conversación adaptadas a las necesidades de cada estudiante.

bio:
***BEFORE BOOKING A CLASS PLEASE SEND ME A MESSAGE***

Molt bon dia! Soc en Josep, un apassionat de la llengua i la cultura catalana. 
Tinc 26 (vint-i-sis) anys i visc a Montcada i Reixac, una ciutat molt a prop de Barcelona. 
D’interessos en tinc un Munt! Des de la natura, l’agricultura, gastronomia, l’esport, la historia, la ciència… Professionalment em dedico a la recerca i docència universitària. Actualment faig un doctorat de psicologia a la universitat autònoma de Barcelona i exerceixo com
headline: Professor universitari i catalanoparlant

name: Greek Piroonluk
bio: สวัสดี! I’m Greek — a Thai theater actress, artist, and your guide to speaking Thai like it’s your language. For 9 years, I’ve blended arts and education at my own school, helping learners *feel* Thai through culture, not just textbooks. Whether you love our street food, dramas, or temples, I’ll teach you the natural flow of conversations—with the confidence of a local. Let’s turn mistakes into stories and words into connections!"
headline: "Let every Thai class be your happy learning time - a safe space, where your Thai grows naturally."

name: Monique
bio:
Hello everyone! I’m Monique, a Brazilian living in France. I help students who speak English or French to improve their Portuguese on Italki. My classes are conversational and adapted to your level, using films, music, and topics about Brazilian culture — and much more! See you in class!
#
Bonjour à tous ! Je suis Monique, une Brésilienne qui vit en France. J’aide les apprenants anglophones et francophones à progresser en portugais sur Italki. Les cours sont axés sur la conversation, adaptés à v
headline: Portuguese conversation classes for English/ French speakers. Practical fluency, at your own pace!

name: Dilara
bio: Hi! I’m Didi 😊 I grew up German-speaking and have used English daily for many years through travel, living abroad, and working with international families. Languages have always been a natural part of my life. I’m creative, open-minded, and love meaningful conversations as much as light, fun exchanges. For me, languages are not just about rules, they’re about confidence, connection, and feeling comfortable expressing yourself in any situation.
headline: Learn German at your pace with clear lessons and cute worksheets

name: Andreas Lindfors
bio:
Hi! My name is Andreas, I’m 24 years old, and I’m from Sweden. I spent much of my teenage years and early adulthood living abroad in Portugal, where I attended an international school and became fluent in English.

Living and studying in such an international environment allowed me to connect with people from all over the world and sparked a strong interest in languages and cultures. Through these experiences, teaching my own language became a natural and enjoyable part of my life.

name: Mikael Lindberg
bio:
Hi! Thanks for your interest in my Norwegian lessons 😊

I’m a native Norwegian speaker, and my lessons focus on calm, natural Norwegian at a comfortable pace. We can use English whenever needed, and lessons are always adapted to your level and goals.

If you have any questions or preferences, feel free to let me know!
headline: Learn Norwegian naturally through clear, comprehensible input

name: Juan Cruz Ciacci
bio: ¡Hola! I’m a Spanish/English teacher and linguist from Argentina, obsessed with phonetics, pronunciation, and grammar hacks that most teachers skip. With 7 years of experience (and the energy of a hyperactive gamer), I turn tricky sounds and rules into bite-sized wins. Battling with sounds? Struggling with conjugations? Lacking motivation? No problem - the only word you will never learn in my lessons is "aburrimiento". I love chess, cats, and petting my cats while I play chess. ¿Qué estás espera
headline: Expert in accent reduction and effective study techniques

name: Marie
bio: Bonjour, my name is Marie ! I'm a French teacher and scriptwriter living in the south of France. I've been teaching French for 15+ years during in person and online lessons. I'm passionate about sharing my love for my language with others ! I'm also very knowledgeable about my country's culture and history and will be more than glad to satisfy your curiosity.
headline: Marie, native French speaker and experienced teacher

name: Antonia
bio: Graduated in Chinese language and literature, I've been working for several Italian companies as a technical interpreter of Chinese and also as a Chinese language teacher for a non-profit association. I am a journalist, chief of the Communication dept. of a public museum. My love for languages stems from my vast curiosity. Humor is what I consider essential to overcoming most of the obstacles we meet with - surely the little ones, including the difficulties we might face in learning new language

name: Kevin
bio:
I'm a 35-year-old content creator and enthusiast for the written word. My life is driven by four core passions: travel, reading, writing, and photography. I translate these interests into engaging content on my blog, focusing on daily life observations, societal topics, global travel, and deep dives into my favorite books. 

With a naturally calm, reflective demeanor, I approach life by prioritizing active listening and thoughtful observation.

name: Anastasiya
bio: Hi! I’m a native Russian speaker from Belarus, now living in sunny Armenia. I help adults and teens start speaking Russian confidently and without fear: we work through grammar in a way that makes sense in dialogues, not only by memorizing rules. I love languages and culture — that’s why in my lessons we learn real Russian: through daily life and people’s stories. I enjoy jazz, books, music, meaningful conversations, and a cup of good coffee. But most of all I love seeing my students begin to co
headline: Native Russian Tutor | Clear Russian grammar through practice — for adults and teens

name: Suzanne Mapati
bio:
Hello! I’m Suzanne Mapati, a counseling psychologist, educator, writer, and artist. I help learners build confidence in speaking Swahili while also nurturing mental wellness and self-expression through language.
I’ve published four books, three based on real experiences and one fiction, which have shaped my storytelling and teaching style. My lessons blend language, culture, and psychology, making learning Swahili both practical and deeply personal.
Whether you’re a beginner or refining your flu
headline: Swahili tutor for Beginners, intermediate and, advanced students. Speak Swahili Confidently.

bio:

bio:

As a native Arabic speaker, I understand the challenges of mastering a new language, so I keep it simple, practical, and fun! Whether you’re preparing for travel, work, or daily conversations, I’ll help you speak and write English naturally, with confidence. Let’s turn mistakes into progress together!
